Posted By: Tim Rhinehart
I had been toying with selling some of my P2's for a few months to go after other items, however, my wife was downsized about a week ago. Therefore, I will be selling just about all of my collection (I am keeping the Pirate pins).  There are 135 pins total.  I have just about all of the tough pins:

Abbaticchio
ARCHER
Bransfield
COLLINS
Donovan
Grant
Hauser
Jones 
Lajoie

Overall
Pelty
Rowan
Scanlon
Turner
Walsh
Warhop
A. Wilson
